title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: We are seeking a versatile Full Stack Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining both front-end and back-end components of our flagship web application. You will work closely with designers and product managers to translate user requirements into functional code. Key responsibilities include creating responsive user interfaces with modern frameworks like React, building robust APIs using Node.js or Python, and optimizing database schemas for performance. The ideal candidate has 3+ years of experience, a strong understanding of web security best practices, and a passion for building scalable, high-quality software.
